interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 Pack Hair Clips Review Date: 2021/06/10 Store: Cobahom Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cobahom', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: These leopard print duckbill clips are so adorable! They are a very pretty yellowish gold type metal and are very sturdy. I personally chose them because my mother loves leopard print and I plan on sending her the 3 lighter ones and I know she’ll love them.

These clips are very easy to use and add so much flare to your hair. I personally like wearing leopard print when I wear solid colors. Cute trick, leopard print goes with ANY color 😉 just don’t mix patterns and I promise it’ll be cute especially if it’s all solids !

They are very well made and I do not see these breaking anytime soon. Sorry I don’t have photos of them in my hair. Review Title: So lovely! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools LXIANGN {} I personally love these dappen dishes!

Many complaints I’ve seen is that the lid doesn’t match the base. But as you can see from the photo, when the lid is on you can’t tell at all. I personally have no problem with them looking different when the lid is off.

The images for the product do look a lot larger then what the product actually is. I consider this a mini size. I absolutely love the size and I am glad it isn’t larger because it fits in my carry all perfectly.

It holds the liquids well and is very easy to clean. I didn’t have issues dipping my brushes into them or removing the access liquid.

I feel like these can even be used to hold all your stud earrings or something small.

Very satisfied with this product. So cute 6 Pack Hair Clips Cobahom {'Brand': 'Cobahom', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} These leopard print duckbill clips are so adorable! They are a very pretty yellowish gold type metal and are very sturdy. I personally chose them because my mother loves leopard print and I plan on sending her the 3 lighter ones and I know she’ll love them.

These clips are very easy to use and add so much flare to your hair. I personally like wearing leopard print when I wear solid colors. Cute trick, leopard print goes with ANY color 😉 just don’t mix patterns and I promise it’ll be cute especially if it’s all solids !

They are very well made and I do not see these breaking anytime soon. Sorry I don’t have photos of them in my hair. So lovely!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to demonstrate a clear affinity for aesthetically pleasing beauty accessories, now expanding to include hair tools alongside nail art and manicure supplies.

- **Design Sensitivity:** Maintains a strong appreciation for cute and visually appealing products, as highlighted by the recent review emphasizing the charming design of hair clips.

- **Size Consideration:** Values practicality in size and portability, suggesting an ongoing interest in compact beauty tools suitable for travel.

- **Functionality:** Prioritizes usability and ease of application in products, continuing to appreciate items that are not only attractive but also effective in performance.

- **Versatility:** Exhibits creativity in utilizing beauty products for a variety of purposes, indicating an interest in multi-functional accessories for personal expression in styling.

- **User Experience:** Generally has a positive outlook towards products and a tendency to appreciate high-quality construction, even when specific aspects are not flawless or when features are shared across product categories.

Overall, the user is a dedicated beauty enthusiast who seeks both stylish and functional tools, embracing products that enhance their beauty routine while reflecting personal taste. The recent purchase suggests a growing interest in hair accessories that complement their aesthetic preferences and practical considerations.
